query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tour_ab_tests (
  id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  test_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  tour_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  variant_a_config JSON NOT NULL COMMENT 'Control variant configuration',
  variant_b_config JSON NOT NULL COMMENT 'Test variant configuration',
  variant_a_weight INT DEFAULT 50 COMMENT 'Percentage of users assigned to variant A (0-100)',
  variant_b_weight INT DEFAULT 50 COMMENT 'Percentage of users assigned to variant B (0-100)',
  start_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  end_date TIMESTAMP NULL,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  winner_variant ENUM('A', 'B', 'none') DEFAULT 'none',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_tour_name (tour_name),
  INDEX idx_is_active (is_active),
  INDEX idx_test_dates (start_date, end_date)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='A/B test configurations for onboarding tours';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tour_ab_tests (
  id BIGINT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  test_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  tour_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  variant_a_config JSON NOT NULL COMMENT 'Control variant configuration',
  variant_b_config JSON NOT NULL COMMENT 'Test variant configuration',
  variant_a_weight INT DEFAULT 50 COMMENT 'Percentage of users assigned to variant A (0-100)',
  variant_b_weight INT DEFAULT 50 COMMENT 'Percentage of users assigned to variant B (0-100)',
  start_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  end_date TIMESTAMP NULL,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  winner_variant ENUM('A', 'B', 'none') DEFAULT 'none',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_tour_name (tour_name),
  INDEX idx_is_active (is_active),
  INDEX idx_test_dates (start_date, end_date)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='A/B test configurations for onboarding tours';
